alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 28 at 11:14AM EDT until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Moderate to Major severity for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. .As Hurricane Ian moves onshore to the southwest Florida coast today, historic heavy rainfall will spread across Central Florida, leading to quickly rising levels on the Saint Johns River at Astor. At this forecast point, the river is currently in Minor Flood Stage and is expected to rise to Major Flood stage by Thursday evening, potentially reaching Record Flood Stage early Friday morning. Interests along the river should be prepared for major flood impacts, with flood levels greater than observed during Irma in 2017. Due to wind effects and drainage from upstream, the river is forecast to remain in Major Flood through the weekend. For the St. Johns River...including Astor...Major flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1100 AM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Astor. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Major flooding occurs, with water entering the first story of many homes and businesses along the river. Some roads inaccessible and rescues likely needed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 2.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM EDT Wednesday was 2.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.6 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 2.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon St Johns River Astor 2.3 2.7 Wed 10 am 3.2 4.6 4.1 4.1 4.2 &&
